channel.title: Mathblogging.org -- Editors' Picks
channel.description: Your one stop shop for mathematical blogs
channel.copyright: No copyright asserted over individual posts; see original posts for copyright and/or licensing.

item.title: @MrHonner's pick
item.description: Excellent, even-handed review of "The Math Myth" by @evelynjlamb in @slate https://t.co/4k7VzfBw05 #math #mathchat #edchat #mbpick
item.dc:creator: @MrHonner
